result:
<v-container
  fill-height
  fluid
  grid-list-xl
>
  <v-row justify="center">
    <v-col cols="12">
      <v-dialog v-model="dialog" width = "500">
        <template v-slot:activator="{ on }">
          <v-btn color="primary" dark class="mb-2" v-on="on">New Department</v-btn>
        </template>
        <v-card>
          <v-card-title
            class="headline grey lighten-2"
            primary-title
          >
            Add Department
          </v-card-title>
          <v-card-text>
            <v-container>
              <v-row>
                <v-text-field v-model = "editedDepartment.name" label="Name"></v-text-field>
              </v-row> 
            </v-container> 
          </v-card-text>
          <v-card-actions class="justify-center">
            <v-btn color="blue darken-1" text @click="cancel">Cancel</v-btn>
            <v-btn color="blue darken-1" text @click="save">Save</v-btn>
          </v-card-actions>
        </v-card>
      </v-dialog>
      <material-card
        color="green"
        title="Departments Table"
        text=""
      >
        <v-data-table
          :headers="headers"
          :items="departments"
          :items-per-page="5"
        >
          <template v-slot:item.action = "{ item }">
            <v-btn
              icon
            >
              <v-icon color="tertiary" @click="openDetail(item)">
                mdi-apps
              </v-icon>
            </v-btn>
            <v-btn
              icon
            >
              <v-icon color="tertiary" @click="remove(item)">
                mdi-delete
              </v-icon>
            </v-btn>
          </template>
        </v-data-table>
      </material-card>
    </v-col>
  </v-row>
</v-container>
